headline: BofA Touts Uber Technologies Inc. (UBER) Prospects in Autonomous Vehicles on Nvidia Partnership
summary: Uber Technologies Inc. (NYSE:UBER) is one of the best blue-chip stocks to buy for 2026. On January 6, BofA Securities reiterated a Buy rating on Uber Technologies Inc. (NYSE:UBER) and set a $119 price target. The research firm has echoed the company’s positioning in the autonomous vehicle market, which is critical to its long-term prospects. […]
